MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Orchard Brae and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.59pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Orchard Brae substation and are investigating the cause of the power cut. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.50pm on the 5th of November 2020.
